abort.different_device: The device at this address is different from the original

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Philips AirPurifier
reconfigure.description: Update the IP address or hostname for this device.

deprecated_dhcp_service_info.title: Deprecated DhcpServiceInfo usage
deprecated_dhcp_service_info.description: The integration is using deprecated DhcpServiceInfo. Please update to the latest version.

connectivity_issue.title: Air Purifier Connectivity Issue
connectivity_issue.description: Your air purifier device is not responding to network requests. This may be due to network connectivity issues, device power state, or IP address changes. Click 'Fix' to attempt automatic resolution.

entity_registry_cleanup.title: Entity Registry Cleanup Required
entity_registry_cleanup.description: Orphaned or duplicate entities have been detected in the entity registry. This can happen after device reconfigurations or integration updates. Click 'Fix' to clean up automatically.

filter_replacement_warning.title: Filter Replacement Required
filter_replacement_warning.description: One or more filters in your air purifier need attention. Check the filter status sensors for replacement or cleaning requirements. Click 'Fix' to acknowledge this warning.

configuration_migration.title: Configuration Migration Required
configuration_migration.description: Your integration configuration needs to be updated to support new features. This migration will update your configuration automatically without losing any settings.

duplicate_entities.title: Duplicate Entities Detected
duplicate_entities.description: Duplicate entities have been detected. This typically happens when entity unique IDs conflict. Click 'Fix' to remove duplicate entities automatically.

filter_reset.name: Reset Filter Life
filter_reset.description: Reset filter life counters and maintenance schedules for the specified air purifier.

filter_type.name: Filter Type
filter_type.description: Type of filter to reset (all, pre_filter, hepa_filter, active_carbon_filter, nanoprotect_filter)

reset_maintenance_schedule.name: Reset Maintenance Schedule
reset_maintenance_schedule.description: Whether to reset the maintenance reminder schedule

calibrate_sensors.name: Calibrate Air Quality Sensors
calibrate_sensors.description: Calibrate air quality sensors (PM2.5, allergen index, gas sensors) on the air purifier.

sensor_type.name: Sensor Type
sensor_type.description: Type of sensor to calibrate (all, pm25, allergen_index, gas, tvoc)

reference_value.name: Reference Value
reference_value.description: Reference value for manual calibration (only used in manual mode)

set_display_brightness.name: Set Display Brightness
set_display_brightness.description: Control the display brightness level of the air purifier.

brightness_level.name: Brightness Level
brightness_level.description: Display brightness level (0-100, where 0 is off and 100 is maximum brightness)

auto_dim.name: Auto Dim
auto_dim.description: Enable automatic dimming based on ambient light

night_mode.name: Night Mode
night_mode.description: Enable night mode (very dim display during nighttime hours)

night_mode_start.name: Night Mode Start Time
night_mode_start.description: Start time for night mode (24-hour format)

night_mode_end.name: Night Mode End Time
night_mode_end.description: End time for night mode (24-hour format)

schedule_maintenance.name: Schedule Maintenance
schedule_maintenance.description: Set up maintenance reminder schedules for the air purifier.

next_reminder_date.name: Next Reminder Date
next_reminder_date.description: Date for the next maintenance reminder

enable_notifications.name: Enable Notifications
enable_notifications.description: Whether to send notifications when maintenance is due

notification_advance_days.name: Notification Advance Days
notification_advance_days.description: How many days before maintenance is due to send notifications

maintenance_notes.name: Maintenance Notes
maintenance_notes.description: Optional notes about the maintenance schedule

set_child_lock.name: Set Child Lock
set_child_lock.description: Enable or disable child lock on the air purifier.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.description: Whether to enable or disable child lock

set_timer.name: Set Timer
set_timer.description: Set an automatic timer for the air purifier to turn off after a specified duration.

duration_hours.name: Duration (Hours)
duration_hours.description: Number of hours after which the device should turn off (0 to disable timer)

action_after_timer.name: Action After Timer
action_after_timer.description: What to do when timer expires

reset_device.name: Reset Device
reset_device.description: Reset the air purifier to factory defaults.

confirm_reset.name: Confirm Reset
confirm_reset.description: Confirmation that you want to reset the device (required for safety)
